import React,{useState}from'react';import TaskList from'./components/TaskList';import TaskForm from'./components/TaskForm';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const handleTaskAdded=newTask=>{setTasks([...tasks,newTask]);};const handleTaskDelete=taskId=>{setTasks(tasks.filter(task=>task.id!==taskId));};const handleTaskComplete=taskId=>{setTasks(tasks.map(task=>task.id===taskId?{...task,completed:!task.completed}:task));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"todo-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"todo-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"todo-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Todo App"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"todo-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskForm,{onTaskAdded:handleTaskAdded}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskList,{tasks:tasks,onTaskDelete:handleTaskDelete,onTaskComplete:handleTaskComplete})]})]})});};export default App;
